EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - Medical and Support form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Medical and Support form
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Following on from our earlier telephone conversaion I have attached to this email the medical and support form to be completed by {!Contact.FirstName}'s legal guardian as part of their NCS application.
Please:
Complete the medical and support form attached to this email, making sure to answer each question. Sign the consent statement on the final page agreeing to our terms and conditions. Return this to us using one of the below options.
Please send a scan (or digital photo of each page) to inclusion.support@the-challenge.org
Alternatively you can send this by post addressed to Inclusion and Support Service, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ.
We will review the information you provide and may contact you again in the future for further information.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by calling 0333 150 2425 or emailing inclusion.support@the-challenge.org - we’ll be happy to help.
If you have any questions about the programme or application in general, please phone our Customer Service team on 0203 542 2400.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
